attributes.additional_details: I am putting to the department of Health that they should push for Stephen Sutton to be Posthumously Knighted in the Queens honours. For what that young man did for Teenage Cancer sufferers everywhere was a tremendous achievement and more important than a Sportsperson winning a Gold Medal or a Football Manager winning Trophies. If there is any way the public and goverment can fight for this to happen then I believe that's what should be done.
